item.title: AI industry horrified to face largest copyright class action ever certified
item.description: Copyright class actions could financially ruin AI industry, trade groups say.

item.title: OpenAI offers 20 million user chats in ChatGPT lawsuit. NYT wants 120 million.
item.description: OpenAI asks judge to drastically limit NYT access to ChatGPT logs.

item.title: Meta pirated and seeded porn for years to train AI, lawsuit says
item.description: Lawsuit: Meta may have seeded porn to minors while hiding piracy for AI training.

item.title: Toy company may regret coming for “Sylvanian Drama” TikToker, experts say
item.description: Possible legal paths to revive a shuttered video series on TikTok and Instagram.
